HomePage.title: Welcome to the <highlight>Modded Minecraft Wiki</highlight>
HomePage.subtitle: Your go-to resource for discovering, creating, and contributing to Minecraft-related projects.

popular.title: Wikis Populares
popular.disclaimer: These projects are highlighted based on their popularity through view statistics and are not officially endorsed by Modded Minecraft Wiki.

users.title: Users
users.subtitle: Explore our featured projects and enjoy these benefits:
users.docs: Access high-quality, up-to-date and versioned documentation
users.contribute: Contribute to projects without programming knowledge
users.ui: Enjoy a consistent, user-friendly interface across all projects

authors.title: Authors
authors.subtitle: Get access to the Project Dashboard and enjoy these benefits:
authors.components: Custom components for recipes, assets, etc.
authors.interaction: Direct interaction with your user base

localization.title: Localization
localization.desc: Translate your docs into world languages

open.title: Open
open.desc: Let your users contribute without any programming knowledge necessary

free.title: Free
free.desc: Hosting docs on our website is completely free of charge!

about.title: About Us
about.maintainers: The Wiki is built and maintained by Sinytra, a dedicated team of passionate developers focused on delivering high-quality, Free and Open Source software for the Minecraft modding community.
about.mission: Our goal is to empower modders and players alike by providing the tools and resources necessary to create, document, and explore the endless possibilities of modded Minecraft.

BrowsePage.no_results: ¡La consulta de búsqueda no ha devuelto resultados!

Login.title: Se requiere iniciar sesión
Login.desc: La página a la que está intentando acceder requiere que inicie sesión.
Login.prompt: Por favor, utiliza tu cuenta de GitHub para continuar.

Preview.title: El modo de previsualización está habilitado
Preview.desc: El modo de previsualización permite una interfaz de usuario mínima, permitiéndole enfocarse en redactar sus documentos localmente antes de que sean publicados.

Report.title: Reportar una página de documentación
Report.desc: Informar del contenido que viola nuestros Términos de Servicio o nuestras Normas de Contenido.
Report.contact: For contact purposes, your username (and email address, if you provide us one) will be included in the report.
Report.confidential: Your privacy is important to us, and this information will always be kept confidential.
Report.privacy: For more information, please refer to our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

email.title: Reply email address
email.desc: (Optional) Contact email address we can use to inform you about updates on this report, or to request additional information.

reason.title: Reason*
reason.placeholder: Select a reason for reporting this page

details.title: Details*
details.placeholder: Please provide more details on why you're reporting this page. Note that empty reports will be ignored.

dislike.title: We understand that you may not like this page, and that's totally okay!
dislike.desc: Unfortunately, however, it is not a valid reason to report a project.
dislike.suggestion: Would you like to look for something else to read instead?

ProjectRegisterForm.title: Registrar proyecto
ProjectRegisterForm.desc: Registrar un nuevo proyecto en la wiki.

branch.title: Rama
branch.desc: Primary branch ref. You can specify additional branches to include in your metadata file.

path.title: Ruta a la raíz de documentación
path.desc: Path to the folder containing the metadata file.

errors.install_app: Please first install our GitHub app on your repository <link>here</link>.

success.title: Project registered successfully
success.desc: You can now navigate to the project's docs page

ProjectSettingsForm.title: Editar proyecto
ProjectSettingsForm.desc: Editar la configuración de un proyecto existente.

success.title: Proyecto actualizado correctamente
success.desc: You can now navigate to the updated project's docs page

ProjectDeleteForm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
ProjectDeleteForm.desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your project and remove all associated data from our servers.

ProjectRevalidateForm.title: Reload project pages?
ProjectRevalidateForm.primary: All stored documentation pages will be purged and re-fetched from the source.
ProjectRevalidateForm.secondary: Esta opción solo debería utilizarse cuando se actualice la fuente de documentación en sí.
ProjectRevalidateForm.tertiary: Para su propia comodidad, le recomendamos que vuelva a validar automáticamente los documentos después de su publicación utilizando nuestro <link>plugin de Gradle</link> en su lugar.
ProjectRevalidateForm.note: Project registration data remains unchanged. For updating meta information (e.g. source and platforms), please use the Settings dialog instead.

errors.insufficient_wiki_perms: Insufficient permissions to create community project
errors.insufficient_repo_perms: User does not have access to repository.
errors.no_meta: Archivo de metadatos no se ha encontrado
errors.invalid_meta: El archivo de metadatos no es válido
errors.no_platforms: No platform projects defined in metadata.
errors.cf_unavailable: Registering CurseForge projects is not active
errors.no_project: Platform project not found. Please make sure the metadata "slug" field is correct.
errors.internal: Internal Server Error, please try again later.

GetHelpModal.button: Is your project not showing up?
GetHelpModal.title: Project help
GetHelpModal.desc: Help resolve common issues with project registration.

app.title: Ensure the GitHub app is installed on your repository

other.title: Otros problemas
other.desc: Consulte la sección de solución de problemas de la guía de Publicación de documentación.
other.link: Abrir guía de solución de problemas

MigrateRepositoryForm.title: Migrar repositorio del proyecto
MigrateRepositoryForm.desc: Actualizar los datos del repositorio después de que su ubicación haya cambiado.

owner.title: Propietario antiguo
owner.desc: Usuario antiguo / nombre de la organización.

success.title: Repositorio migrado con éxito
success.desc: Ahora puedes ver los proyectos migrados

migrate_error.install_app: Asegúrate de que nuestra aplicación de GitHub esté <link>instalada</link> en el repositorio migrado.
migrate_error.unavailable: No hay migración disponible para el repositorio. ¿Es correcta la información introducida?

CommunityBadge.title: Comunidad
CommunityBadge.desc: Documentación no oficial mantenida por la comunidad

DocsPageNotFoundError.title: Perdimos esta página
DocsPageNotFoundError.desc: La página de documentación solicitada no está disponible por el momento.
DocsPageNotFoundError.suggestion: Please try again later or report this issue to the project author.

GetStartedModal.title: I'd like to write documentation for...

dev.title: My own project
dev.desc: Author your own documentation and control who can make changes to it.

community.title: Someone else's project
community.desc: Contribute to a collection of community docs maintained by wiki editors

DocsHomepagePlaceholder.title: Homepage placeholder
DocsHomepagePlaceholder.subtitle: Due to API restrictions, project metadata is not available for CurseForge projects in local environments.
DocsHomepagePlaceholder.replace: Don't worry! We'll replace this placeholder with the project's actual description once deployed on the live wiki website.

empty.primary: Looks like you haven't registered any projects yet
empty.secondary: Get started by reading our <guide>author guide</guide>.
